title: HTML Basics
description: Read about HTML tags and create a simple webpage.

title: CSS Styling
description: Apply basic CSS styles to a webpage, including colors and fonts.

title: Flexbox Practice
description: Create a simple layout using CSS Flexbox.

title: JavaScript Variables
description: Learn about let, const, and var in JavaScript.

title: DOM Manipulation
description: Write a script to change text content of an HTML element on button click.

title: Event Listeners
description: Attach click events to buttons and log messages to the console.

title: Array Methods
description: Practice JavaScript array methods like map, filter, and reduce.

title: Fetch API
description: Make a simple GET request to an API and display the response.

title: Local Storage
description: Store and retrieve user input using localStorage.

title: CSS Grid Layout
description: Create a 2x2 grid layout using CSS Grid.

title: Async/Await
description: Write an async function that fetches data from an API.

title: React Component
description: Read an article on React components and show a demo of 3 example components.

title: Node.js Server
description: Set up a basic Express server that responds with 'Hello, World!'.

title: MongoDB Connection
description: Connect to a MongoDB database using Mongoose.

title: Git Basics
description: Initialize a Git repository and make your first commit.
